txt.en:
'You might be able to lend us some aid.

'We are running low on sharp swords! We have not a spare man to sharpen them, when we need more men who can swing them. If you have a moment, please take this whetstone and sharpen any dull blades you can find around the town.

'When you have done this, return to Herefara for further instructions.'
As the men valiantly defend Brockbridge, they occasionally discard ineffective weapons and grab a new one to keep fighting. These dull blades now litter the ground throughout the town.
Herefara is on the northern side of Brockbridge.\n\nMula had instructed you to return to Herefara when you were finished.
'I see that you have been busy helping around town. Your assistance is appreciated.  \n\n'It is now time that we work towards breaking through this siege.'
Discarded dull blades can be found throughout Brockbridge.\n\nMula has asked you to sharpen the dulled blades that the defenders of Brockbridge have discarded.
